reviewText: Nice documentary.
Good documentary on the early life of Ronaldo!
Awesome
It was awesome

A superficial but good documentary about Ronaldo's life. It covers the main aspects of his personal and professional life with no much details. He is a great player who is an inspiration to young generations

I am a huge fan of Cristiano Ronaldo I was hoping to learn more about him from this documentary basically it tells you pretty much the basic things you already know and at times its focus is only off cristiano and talks about other former football players and other gossip like Cristiano being linked to Paris Hilton it was okay I wish would have like interviews from Cristiano and maybe his family members it's not boring nor is it exciting either I rather wait for official documentary Ronaldo coming this Fall I'm sure it will be far better.
A fascinating retrospective into an incredible athlete.
2 thumbs up!
Awesome background on the great soccer player. And, shows you things that he does to help where he came from that the media does not show.

The script was disappointingly repetitive, as were the visuals.  You can get a great deal more of Ronaldo's brilliant footwork on You Tube.  That being said, the documentary did touch on aspects of his life I was unaware of, such as how poor he was growing up and his support of charities, and kindness to children.  That was nice.
One the best of the player in the field but excellent person outside the field
Not very well done. Public clips spliced and they call it a movie.
Ok
It was very informative. I learned things about his childhood I never knew. Definitely worth a watch.
BORING! BORING
It was an interesting documentary but we lost interest after a while in watching it.
Ok. Needs more substance.
Love this video!
The film gave me tons of insight into what made Ronaldo...Ronaldo!
My son loved it.
This is that movie that all the kids here in US needs to see. To let them realize how much they have in comparison to other kids in other countries. I definitely recommend it.
A 6 yr old sat through the whole movie
Very informative.
Very interesting and great rags to riches story.
A very compelling documentary. Inspiring -this man has really worked for his success and has not forgotten the world around him.
For someone who doesn't know Cristiano Ronaldo very well, the movie is very informative.
Movie was more of a documentary. It was informative and I enjoyed some off his charitable contributions I did not know about
Touching and true!
Simply The Best!
Very inspiring movie .
It was an intersting documentary
Cristiano Ronaldo is a great soccer player and humanatiran
A nice biography of Ronaldo on and off the field.
Enjoyed it.  Ronaldo is an interesting story.
If you like Christiano Ronaldo and you want to learn more about him, watch this! It is a very interesting, sort of documentary. It shows a lot about Christiano Ronaldo!
A must see for Ronaldo Fans.  I am his Doppelganger so of course I enjoyed the Film.
If you a fan well worth the watch.. If your into soccer well worth the watch.
I thought there would be more soccer!
Blah
Great documentary. My 9 year old loved it too.
Good story
great movie, helps to inspire youth playing soccer
Great story!
Interesting and informative.  I have more respect for Mr. Ronaldo than I did before seeing this.  He isn't just a pretty face that can play soccer.

Goes back and forth in time without any understandable reason.
Jumping from one story to another with no transition.
My 10 year old soccer player enjoyed this movie. We learned things we didn't know about Ronaldo.
Awesome insight into a great player.
esperaba mucho mas

I love CR7 since 2005, but I expected more of this movie. As a long time fan, I would have like to see more of his hard training sessions, the feelings he had during the world cups with more details, more details about how he handle frustration and the feeling of despair and failure. I would have like this movie to be more of an inspiration to kids playing soccer than just info about Cristiano. Sorry babe.
I honestly expected a little more out of this movie. Overall it was pretty good. It gives you a little inside of what he goes through on a daily basis.
Thought this was the new movie but it isn't. Like others have mentioned, it's a vanity fluff story. Stuff I already knew being a fan. Hope the new movie will reveal more.
The quality of the movie was extremely poor.
It was somewhat informative about the athlete, but was very poorly done.  It felt like an amateur video.  Very choppy transitions, poor sound quality, and repetitive images.
It's not a movie, it a documentary about him , but it's really good !!
Ronaldo sucks
Awesome!!!!
Great documentary with substance
Very good
Ronaldo> every other player ever
Very good documentary!

I wanted to love this movie, but it was just ok. Part of Cristiano's appeal for me is his ego, but this movie showed a bit too much ego. There's a part about Messi and Ronaldo's rivalry and it was just totally unnecessary. Basically comparing their looks, who's better looking. That was a big turn off. But it was nice to see Ronaldo the philanthropist. The movie gave me almost a propaganda feeling....

Documentary would be categorically wrong. All this film does is say how great Ronaldo is. He is so humble. He is so extravagant...but also humble. He is such a great player. Nothing is ever said except "Ronaldo is perfect." Save your money. I'm not a CR7 hater I just love football. Disappointed.
Love it
Great
The video is ok. Pretty much known info  nothing new
it was kind of ish I was hoping it would be more like the Pele movie, were it tells his story from his point of veiw rather than the fans
awesome movie  really touch my heart
I bought this as a gift.  A family requested this movie and said they loved it, however, I did not watch the movie.  They said to give it a 5 rating.

It didn't focus entirely on him which is what is what I expected.  Furthermore they took shots of slums in India and other third world nations rather than real shots of his neighborhood to exaggerate his poor upbringing in Portugal.
Good biographical film

This was the Ronaldo so few people know about.

The show was insightful and very broad giving us more than just a birds eye view into the life of one of football's greatest player of his generation. It features not only his rise from the streets of his hometown in Portugal to the master he is at Real Madrid, but also into his private family life and the things he endured including watching his mother battle with cancer.

This one is a definite recommend.
nope
Awesome documentary about one of the greatest soccer players of all time.
put together with all older footage.
Great to watch, wasn't a fan of Ronaldo but now I am.
